alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Susquehanna; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 7:44PM EST until March 07 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sullivan County in central New York... Southeastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Central Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EST. * At 744 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Forest City, or near Carbondale, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Honesdale, Bethel, Damascus, Callicoon, Forest City, Tusten, Cochecton, Waymart and Vandling. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
